movies.title: Binibining Tsuper-Man
movies.plot: Rogelio is a gay jeepney driver who is being bullied by his fellow jeepney drivers because of his sexuality. His father devises ways to make him a straight man. Madame of Planet Appear comes to Rogelio and gives him superpowers to defend the oppressed and to fight Lucerfito of Planet Satan from spreading evil.
movies.simplePlot: Rogelio is a gay jeepney driver who is being bullied by his fellow jeepney drivers because of his sexuality. His father devises ways to make him a straight man. Madame of Planet Appear ...

biography.bio: Roderick Paulate is an actor, known for Ded na si Lolo (2009), Pa-siyam (2004) and Mga anghel na walang langit (1970).
biography.name: Roderick Paulate

biography.bio: Miguel Rodriguez is an actor, known for Bilangin ang bituin sa langit (1989), Virgin Forest (1985) and Bubble's Ativan Gang (1988). He was previously married to Irene Salud Tess Que.
biography.name: Miguel Rodriguez

biography.bio: Panchito was born on February 25, 1925 in Paco, Manila, Philippines as Alfonso Tagle. He was an actor, known for Dakilang tanga (1968), Sheman: Mistress of the Universe (1988) and Atsay killer buti nga sa'yo (1984). He died in December 1995 in Manila.
biography.name: Panchito

biography.bio: Babalu was born as Pablito Sarmiento. He is an actor, known for Haba-baba-doo! Puti-puti-poo! (1998), Tong tatlong tatay kong pakitong kitong (1998) and Omeng Satanasia (1977).
biography.name: Babalu

biography.bio: Jaime Fabregas was born on February 28, 1950 in Iriga City, Camarines Sur, Philippines. He is an actor and composer, known for May bukas pa (2009), Imortal (2010) and José Rizal (1998). He is married to Consuelo T. Fabregas.
biography.name: Jaime Fabregas

biography.bio: Georgie Quizon was born as Georgie Vera Quizon. He was an actor, known for Dakilang tanga (1968), Alipin ng busabos (1968) and If You Go Away (1970). He died in 1998.
biography.name: Georgie Quizon

biography.bio: Zorayda Sanchez was an actress, known for Tiyanak (1988), Broken Marriage (1983) and Binibining Tsuper-Man (1987). She died on August 27, 2008 in Angono, Rizal, Philippines.
biography.name: Zorayda Sanchez

biography.bio: Lou Veloso (born January 11, 1965) is a Filipino actor, comedian, theater actor, director and politician. He is known for his supporting roles in over 30 popular comedy films, which include Mga kwento ni Lola Basyang (1985), Pulis Patola (1993), Ang Cute ng ina mo! (2007), Desperadas 2 (2008). As an actor, Veloso has also performed in movies such as "Kabayo kids", released in 1990, in which he portrayed Loreiga, "Buddy en Sol (Sine ito)"(1992), and "M & M: The Incredible Twins"(1989).
biography.name: Lou Veloso

biography.bio: Monica Herrera is an actress, known for Angel Molave (1990), Ako ... ang huhusga (1989) and Rosang Tatoo (1992).
biography.name: Monica Herrera

biography.bio: Rose Ann Gonzales is an actress, known for God Save Me! (1985), Lumuhod ka sa lupa! (1986) and Lorenzo Ruiz... The Saint... A Filipino! (1988).
biography.name: Rose Ann Gonzales

biography.bio: Jackie Aquino is an actress, known for Because I Love You (1993), Moises Platon (1988) and Mulanay: Sa pusod ng paraiso (1996).
biography.name: Jackie Aquino

biography.bio: Melinda Estrella is an actress, known for Binibining Tsuper-Man (1987).
biography.name: Melinda Estrella

biography.bio: Josie Torillas is an actress, known for Binibining Tsuper-Man (1987).
biography.name: Josie Torillas

biography.bio: Margie Sara is an actress, known for Binibining Tsuper-Man (1987) and Ang pangarap ko'y ikaw (1967).
biography.name: Margie Sara

biography.bio: Maryann Paulate is an actress, known for Binibining Tsuper-Man (1987), High School Circa '65 (1979) and Kumander Gringa (1987).
biography.name: Maryann Paulate
